etymology.interpretation: 钅 is a simplified form of the character 金, historically associated with metal, and especially copper. It retains the connotation of metal but omits some details of its original complexity for ease of writing. It was created to simplify common writing while preserving the essential meaning associated with metalwork and metallurgy.
etymology.simplification: Simplified from 金 to reduce the number of strokes and simplify writing.
